subject: Caroline's Quiz - Fun Facts
content:
Dear Travelers,

We have had over one thousand players take part in our quiz in the space of four days! Now it's time to take a look at some of the fun facts from this event...



Fatal Lapses in Judgement

95 Travelers think it's a good idea to jump from a great height without a Wind Glider;

131 Travelers don't think they'll drown if they go for a swim with low Stamina;

72 Travelers commented that you can expect to receive a devastating electric shock if you fail to return library books to Lisa on time.

_(TeaTime)



Co-op

Co-op mode unlocks at Adventurer Rank 16, a total of 341 Travelers got this wrong > <



Baron Bunny

Baron Bunny seems to be quite the favorite among Travelers and most of you got this right. But there are 12 confused souls who think Amber can summon Xiao

_(Shocked)



Cuties

Lisa must have made a lasting impression on all you cuties as 98% of you answered this question correctly.

It's also Caroline's first time to get called a 'cutie'. Lisa is so enchanting...she makes me blush (♡´艸`)

_(GoodJob)



Heartbroken Again

323 Travelers broke Timmie's heart again, none of you knew his name...

(Poor Timmie (　´_ゝ`) )



Emergency Food Supply

Apparently, 112 Travelers wished to remind Caroline that Paimon is, in fact, emergency food, and a further 47 of you wondered aloud what Paimon tastes like.

_(Cooking)



Piece of Cake

99 Travelers who weren't lucky enough to take part in our CBT still managed to get ALL of the questions right. Caroline is super impressed! ( ﾟДﾟ)b



Now comes the moment we've all been eagerly waiting for, Caroline will announce the lucky winners!


===== List of Winners =====


Following are all of the winners, congratulations! If you are among the lucky ones, please check out the link below and follow the instructions to claim your rewards. Failure to follow directions will be seen as forfeit~


『Paimon Keychain』

1. Frost your keys 2693289

2. Toast 1036649

3. ekumino 5033986

4. GGenesis 1058102

5. Axle075 1089137

6. cantsdn 5029156


>>>Still don't know how to collect rewards? Click on me!<<<

(section 2)
